original_title: Kim Jong Un calls for rapid nuclear arsenal expansion amid US drills | Fox News
article_summary: North Korea's leader, Kim Jong Un, has called for the rapid expansion of North Korea's nuclear arsenal in response to U.S.-South Korea military exercises. This move indicates North Korea's refusal to accept denuclearization and its intent to further develop nuclear weapons. The escalating tensions come amid South Korea's efforts to reduce tensions with North Korea, including the potential restoration of a 2018 military agreement.</s>
